page.title: 05YATE FIRE STATION
page.content: The Fire Station in Yate covers a very large area. These are the outside places which end up in a circle: Badminton, Hawkesbury, Horton,Wickwar, Rangeworthy, Iron Acton parts of Frampton Cotterell and Winterbourne, Westerleigh, Codrington and Acton Turville. The Fire Station was built in 1969 it has 2 fire engines; 25 firemen_ 13 that work full time and 12 that work part time (they are called retained) The worst fire they had to deal with recently was in Dursley. The Yate station was called in to help. The fire needed 20 Fire Engines to put it out.
